bibl.title: In Re Application of Samuel O'Brien for a Writ of Habeas Corpus for Harry O'Brien. Order
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: District Court of the Territory of Washington

body.p: Territory of Washington County of Spokane} SS
In the District Court of Washington Territory - for the Fourth Judicial District Spokane County
In Re application of of Samuel OBrien for a writ of Habeas Corpus for Harry OBrien

The above matter coming on to be heard on the application of Samuel OBrien for a writ of Habeas Corpus for Harry OBrien and the Court being fully informed in the premises it is ordered. that a writ of Habeas Corpus issue as prayed for attestable before me at chambers at 10a.m., Tuesday July 12th, 1887 and that the writ also direct the Sheriff to take into his custody the body of the said Harry OBrien and forthwith bring him before the judge of this Court at his chambers, and it further appearing that an way exists it is ordered that this writ may be served on Sunday.

CASE NO. 1994 1/2
In the District Court Judicial District, holding terms at Cheney.

In the matter of the application of Samuel OBrien Plaintiff. for a writ of habeas corpus
vs.
_____ Defendant.

Filed in the office of the Clerk of the District Court this ____ day of _____ 188_
_____ Clerk.
_____ Deputy.
Turner & Foster
Attorney for petitioner.
